page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: At 7.30 I get up and get my clothes on, I go into the kitchen and have cornflakes and a roll for breakfast. I watch Breakfast television until 8.30. I comb my hair and go out for the bus. When I get to school I play football until the bell rings. We go into the classroom and start our Mathematics. At 10.30 we go into the playground for a little while to play football. When we come back into the classroom we do some language work until lunch time.After lunch I play football. In the afternoon we work on our school newspaper.At 3.30 I get the bus home again then I watch television until 5.00. I had mince and potatoes and banana split for tea. Then I went out on my bike,did my homework,watched television and went to bed at 8.30. Ian Sanderson
